QuestData.Title: Death to the Necromagi
QuestData.Description: When the trolls brought down Kolramas, it crashed next to us to the southeast. Unfortunately the crash did not destroy all of the Scourge within.$B$BNow they're raising our men from the dead and using them against us!$B$BThis will not be allowed to continue. You will see to it that their necromagi are slaughtered! Do we understand each other?
QuestData.LogDescription: Sergeant Moonshard at Drak'Sotra has asked you to destroy 8 Hath'ar Necromagi.
QuestData.CompletionText: No, $c, you're not quite done. I know for a fact that there are still necromagi walking around at Kolramas.
QuestData.RewardText: It's not enough!$B$B<The sergeant's voice cracks as he mourns the corruption of his fallen comrades.>$B$BWe must do more to show respect for the memories of those men!
